news_header: A Japanese finance ministry employee lost documents with personal data of 187 suspected drug smugglers during a night out.
news_original_title: Japan ministry worker on night out loses sensitive files
news_text: A finance ministry employee in Japan lost a bag containing documents with personal data of 187 individuals suspected of drug smuggling during a night out in Yokohama. The employee, who drank heavily, realized the loss only after returning home. The ministry expressed deep regret over the incident, which has undermined public trust. The lost documents included names and addresses of suspected drug smugglers and business laptops with personal data.
